main event: A dark-colored 'ball-shaped' object the size of a basketball was seen traveling at a high speed in the sky in Bernalillo, New Mexico in July 1956.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 3 seconds before disappearing.
A police officer in the area also witnessed the object, adding credibility to the report.
The sighting was classified as 'Unidentified' with possibilities of it being a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical object.
The report suggests insufficient data for a conclusive evaluation.
The sighting took place during a Ground-Visual observation.
